name: PixBall
description:
A Breakout-esque game featuring pixel-art graphics and a vast selection of levels!

  • 11 different types of blocks gradually get introduced over the course of the game to spice up the gameplay! Invisible blocks that show up when first hit, hardened blocks that take multiple hits, bomb blocks that demolish anything around them, and more!
  • Forget about spending 30 minutes trying to hit that last lousy brick! Once a level is demolished enough, it collapses by itself! Hit the falling blocks for ten times the regular bonus, or just bide your time for a guaranteed victory!
  • Collect power-ups that radically improves your power, but be careful - one wrong move and you lose them all when you lose a life!
  • More than 30 levels of various difficulties, each with their own type of hidden power-up to collect!
  • Save your highest score for bragging rights or to challenge yourself!
  • Custom graphics, never seen previously!
